short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge Airbnb by hiding listings you don't like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of looking at the same Airbnb listing for the 5th time? Just hide it from all future seach results! This extension adds a small button to each listing that lets you hide it. Preserved across reruns, navigating between pages, changing the map, etc.
